resources:
User Instruction Power Management Notices Product Basics
Vigory Diary, Health Assistant is useful for obtaining many body health data.

It is non-invasive, so you will not feel any pain during testing. You can also use it several times a day to keep track of your body health.

Through countless laboratory-based experiments and combination of integrated sensor technology, Vigory Diary is also to collect various health data.
1)Press power button to switch on Vigory Diary. 

2)Device will automatically shut down in 3 minutes without using.

3)After testing, please press power button around 3 seconds to shut down. 

4)Testing is not allowed during charging.

5)When battery is lower than 30%, please recharge it before testing.
//Alarm Manager string
Vigori Diary Kindly remind you of
